title: What will mobile apps be able to do differently on 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here’s what InMobi Co-Founder Abhay Singhal recently had to say about 5G on SmartBrief: “5G will lead to unforeseen advances For both adtech and martech specifically, and really for the world at large, 5G has the potential to be immensely disruptive. Autonomous vehicles and drones could be the tip of the iceberg as far as potential applications are concerned. Its effects on society could defy imagination! Think for a moment, about all the changes that came about as a result of 4G and LTE. Without it, there’s no Uber, no WeChat and no Facebook -- at least, not in the way we consume them now. Truthfully, the entire app economy may not have taken off if we were all still relying on 3G. I believe a similar shift will occur with a wider 5G rollout. Everyone -- including advertisers and marketers -- should prepare now for our upcoming digital out-of-home lives.”
